title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body: Been giving me this error when I try to open the client. I've  tried allowing administrator privileges, changing compatibility and reinstalling the client with no result. I'm on Windows 10 64 bit.

replies.body:
Hey oMaRsHyo,

It's possible that this error is caused by a connection issue. Can you try the solutions provided in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article?
